#include<cstdio>
//#include<conio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
int n,m,tot,i,j;
double ans,dp[2505][2505];
double solve(int t,int k)
{
 if(t<=0)return 0;
 if(k>t/2 || k<0)return 0;
 if(dp[t][k]!=-1.0)return dp[t][k];
 double p,res=0.0,a,b;
 p=(double)k/(t-k);
 if(p>1e-9)
 res=p*(solve(t-2,k-1)+1.0);
 p=1.0-p;
 if(p>1e-9)
 {
  a=1.0/(t-k-1);
  b=(double)(k)/(t-k-1);
  res+=p*a*(solve(t-2,k)+1.0)+p*b*(solve(t-2,k)+2.0)+p*(1.0-a-b)*(solve(t,k+2)+1.0);
 }
 return dp[t][k]=res;
}
int main()
{
 for(i=0;i<=2503;i++)
 {
  for(j=0;j<=2503;j++)dp[i][j]=-1.0;
 }
 while((scanf("%d%d",&n,&m))>0) 
 {
  tot=n*m;
  ans=solve(tot,0);
  printf("%.4lf\n",ans);
 }
 //getch();
}
